description.zh-cn: 一家中华人民共和国的宣传片制作工作室，专门以中国政治、经济和外交问题为题材制作在线视频。据报道，该工作室直属于中共中央对外联络部。
description.en: A Chinese propaganda video production studio that specializes in creating online videos on Chinese politics, economy, and foreign policy. It is reportedly directly subordinate to the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

en: International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责对外工作的职能部门。
description.en: An agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由复兴路上工作室于2013年10月推出的视频，以卡通形式介绍美国、英国和中国国家领导人的产生过程。
description.en: A video released by Studio on Fuxing Road in October 2013, which uses animation to explain the process of how national leaders in the United States, the United Kingdom, and China come to power.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国。
description.en: A federal republic in North America.

description.zh-cn: 位于欧洲的君主立宪制国家。
description.en: A constitutional monarchy in Europe.

en: Party and State Leaders of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国拥有最高领导权力的一个政治家群体。
description.en: A group of politicians who hold the highest leadership power in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第五代领导核心，现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席。
description.en: The fifth-generation core leader of the Communist Party of China, currently serving as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

en: Government of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家行政机关，即中央人民政府。
description.en: The state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China, also known as the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的视频分享网站。
description.en: A Chinese video sharing website.

description.zh-cn: 美国的视频分享网站。
description.en: An American video sharing website.

description.zh-cn: 由复兴路上工作室于2015年3月发布的视频，介绍习近平参与2015年博鳌亚洲论坛的安排。
description.en: A video released by Studio on Fuxing Road in March 2015, introducing Xi Jinping's schedule for the 2015 Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 一个总部设在中国的非官方、非营利性国际组织。
description.en: A non-governmental and non-profit international organization headquartered in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的传媒公司。
description.en: A Chinese media company.

en: The Song of the 13th Five-Year Plan

description.zh-cn: 由复兴路上工作室于2015年10月推出的单曲MV，以说唱方式对十三五规划进行解释。
description.en: A music video single released by Studio on Fuxing Road in October 2015, which explains the 13th Five-Year Plan in the form of rap.

en: Fifth Plenary Session of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会于2015年10月在北京举行的第五次全体会议，会议讨论了“十三五”规划。
description.en: The fifth plenary session of the 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, held in Beijing in October 2015, which discussed the 13th Five-Year Plan.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三个五年规划（2016－2020年）。
description.en: The 13th Five-Year Plan of the People's Republic of China (2016-2020).

description.zh-cn: 在美国纽约出版的商业和财经报纸。
description.en: A business and financial newspaper published in New York City, USA.

nodes.id: 英国华誉风险管理咨询公司

zh-cn: 英国华誉风险管理咨询公司

description.zh-cn: 一家英国的咨询公司，曾作为外包公司协助复兴路上工作室制作视频。
description.en: A UK-based consulting company that assisted Studio on Fuxing Road in video production as an outsourced contractor.

description.zh-cn: 根据《华尔街日报》报道及维基百科信息框，复兴路上工作室是中共中央对外联络部的下属机构。
description.en: According to The Wall Street Journal and the Wikipedia infobox, Studio on Fuxing Road is a subordinate organization of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 复兴路上工作室于2013年10月推出了其第一个视频作品《领导人是怎样炼成的》。
description.en: Studio on Fuxing Road launched its first video work, 'How Leaders Are Made', in October 2013.

description.zh-cn: 视频《领导人是怎样炼成的》介绍了美国国家领导人产生的过程。
description.en: The video 'How Leaders Are Made' introduces the process by which national leaders of the United States are selected.

description.zh-cn: 视频《领导人是怎样炼成的》介绍了英国国家领导人产生的过程。
description.en: The video 'How Leaders Are Made' introduces the process by which national leaders of the United Kingdom are selected.

description.zh-cn: 视频《领导人是怎样炼成的》介绍了中国国家领导人产生的过程。
description.en: The video 'How Leaders Are Made' introduces the process by which national leaders of China are selected.

description.zh-cn: 复兴路上工作室制作了多个以习近平为主题的宣传视频，例如关于其外交旅行和参与博鳌亚洲论坛的视频。
description.en: Studio on Fuxing Road has produced multiple propaganda videos featuring Xi Jinping, such as those about his diplomatic trips and his participation in the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 复兴路上工作室于2015年3月发布了视频《跟着大大走之博鳌篇》。
description.en: Studio on Fuxing Road released the video 'Follow Papa Xi to Boao' in March 2015.

description.zh-cn: 壹读传媒旗下的壹读视频参与了《跟着大大走之博鳌篇》视频的部分制作工作。
description.en: Yidu Video, under Yidu Media, participated in some of the production work for the video 'Follow Papa Xi to Boao'.

description.zh-cn: 复兴路上工作室于2015年10月推出了单曲MV《十三五之歌》。
description.en: Studio on Fuxing Road released the music video single 'The Song of the 13th Five-Year Plan' in October 2015.

description.zh-cn: 《十三五之歌》以说唱方式对十三五规划进行了解释和宣传。
description.en: 'The Song of the 13th Five-Year Plan' explains and promotes the 13th Five-Year Plan through rap music.

description.zh-cn: 中共十八届五中全会讨论并审议通过了《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十三个五年规划的建议》。
description.en: The Fifth Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee discussed, deliberated on, and adopted the 'Proposals of the CPC Central Committee for the 13th Five-Year Plan for National Economic and Social Development'.

relationships.source: 英国华誉风险管理咨询公司

description.zh-cn: 英国华誉风险管理咨询公司作为外包公司，接受复兴路上工作室的委托，协助制作了《跟着习大大》系列视频中的部分内容。
description.en: As an outsourced contractor, the UK-based consulting company was commissioned by Studio on Fuxing Road to assist in the production of parts of the 'Following Papa Xi' video series.

description.zh-cn: 复兴路上工作室通常在优酷网上发布其制作的视频。
description.en: Studio on Fuxing Road typically releases its videos on Youku.

description.zh-cn: 复兴路上工作室将其制作的一小部分视频发布在YouTube上。
description.en: Studio on Fuxing Road releases a small portion of its videos on YouTube.
